questions.question: She worked ………………………… and passed the exam.
questions.description: Hard is the adverb for this meaning. Hardly is also an adverb. Its meaning is similar to that of scarcely.

questions.question: She narrated the incident in ……………………….
questions.description: In detail means thoroughly or in depth.

questions.question: The movie was ……………………………. interesting.
questions.description: Too has a negative meaning. It shows negative extremes.

questions.question: He behaved ……………………………….
questions.description: Cowardly is an adjective. We need an adverb to modify a verb.

questions.question: I feel …………………………….. about it.
questions.description: Feel is a copular verb. It is modified by an adjective.

questions.question: She was ………………………………. injured in the accident.
questions.description: Badly is an adverb modifying a verb.

questions.question: I enjoy ………………………………. horror movies.
questions.description: Enjoy is followed by an ing form.
